summary:
Unleash Your Musical Freedom - Our team has focused on a simple idea: Having a music studio at your fingertips. No constraints, no instruments, just unleash your imagination. From your mind to the music.

 Copyright Management - It is a common fact that corporations take the lion’s share of revenue from artists for their creative work, and often bind them to restrictive contracts. Many suggest that the solution is to slide the pay scale more in favor of creators than corporations.

 Blockchain Solution - At StudioAI, we firmly believe that the studios of tomorrow will be 100% AI-assisted. That's why we aim to be the pioneers in integrating this into the world of WEB3 and blockchain.

 First Movers - We're the first movers at the crossroads of AI, blockchain, and music. This fusion unlocks endless possibilities - from collaborative creation to publishing and distribution, all decentralized and unrestricted.

 Generate Inspiration - Conjure up melodies, chords and rhythms with the help of our generative power. Set constraints and let your chosen Generator create playful and original ideas for you to develop and turn into your own.

 Become StudioAi™ ShareHolders - Holders of the $SAI token, get ready to be more than just supporters – you're about to become shareholders in StudioAI!

 A Glimpse into Our Tokenomics - 100M TOTAL SUPPLY, ETH BLOCKCHAIN, 5% BUY/ SELL TAX, $SAI TICKER
